participant_1.background:
For my last birthday, I went to see Justin Timberlake in concert.
I try to distract myself with music or by reading a book.
I have a macbook pro because it's powerful and reliable.
I went to the beach with my family and boyfriend last summer.
I am a dancer who moved to a new country to pursue my passion.

participant_2.background:
I was sailing with Jasper and we saw a pod of dolphins.
i enjoy swimming.
I like drinking hot chocolate while I read my mermaid books.
i have broken my arm twice.
i graduated college last week.

content.text: Hey!
Hey!
How are you doing today?
I am doing good! I just graduated college last week and I am excited about what the future holds!
Oh that is awesome! Congratulations! What did you study?
Thank you! I studied marine biology.
That is so cool! I love the ocean. I once went swimming with dolphins and it was an amazing experience!
That sounds like an amazing experience! I have never been swimming with dolphins but I would love to try it sometime.
You should definitely do it! It is so much fun!
I will!
What are your plans for the future now that you have graduated?
I am not sure yet. I am thinking about going to graduate school or getting a job in the marine industry.
Those are both great options! I am sure you will be successful in whatever you choose to do.
Thank you! I hope so!
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love swimming, reading, and spending time with my friends and family.
Those are all great hobbies! I love swimming too.
Me too! It is so relaxing.
What are your favorite books?
I love reading mermaid books! I think they are so magical.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I have never read a mermaid book before.
You should definitely try it! They are so good!
I will!
